services.name: Project Planning & Consultation
services.description: We'll sit down with you to understand your vision and map out exactly what your app or website needs to do.

services.name: System Design & Planning
services.description: Creating a detailed plan of how all the parts of your app will work together smoothly. (Included in project planning)

services.name: Database & Data Planning
services.description: Designing how your app will store and organize information efficiently and securely. (Included in project planning)

services.name: Static Website
services.description: Building a website that looks great and works perfectly on phones, tablets, and computers. This is ideal for informational sites without complex features.

services.name: Interactive Web Application
services.description: Creating a dynamic web app where users can interact, submit forms, and get real-time updates. This is perfect for more complex websites that need user engagement.

services.name: Mobile App for iPhone & Android
services.description: Building a mobile app that works on both iPhones and Android phones from a single codebase. Great for reaching users on their mobile devices.

services.name: Server & Data Management
services.description: Building the behind-the-scenes system that powers your mobile app or web app and handles all user data securely. This includes managing servers, databases, and APIs.

services.name: User Accounts & Login System
services.description: Setting up secure user registration, login, and managing what different users can access.

services.name: Database Setup
services.description: Setting up secure storage for all your app's information with easy ways to find and update data. (Included in Server & Data Management)

services.name: File Upload & Storage
services.description: Allowing users to upload photos, documents, or files and storing them safely in the cloud.

services.name: Admin Dashboard Backend
services.description: Building the server-side features that power your admin panel for managing users and content. This offers tools to help you manage your app such as user management, content moderation, and analytics.

services.name: Background Tasks & Automation
services.description: Setting up automated tasks like sending emails, processing orders, or generating reports.

services.name: Payment Processing
services.description: Connecting your app to payment systems so customers can pay you safely online. Includes full payment gateway setup and integration.

services.name: Payment Gateway Setup
services.description: Connecting your app to secure payment processors so customers can pay with cards or digital wallets. (Included in Payment Processing)

services.name: Website Analytics Setup
services.description: Adding tracking to see how visitors use your site and what features are most popular.

services.name: SMS & WhatsApp Messaging
services.description: Setting up automated text messages and WhatsApp notifications for your users.

services.name: Push & Email Notifications
services.description: Sending automatic notifications to users' phones and email when important things happen.

services.name: Business Tool Integration
services.description: Connecting your app to business tools like customer management systems or accounting software.

services.name: Cloud Infrastructure Setup
services.description: Setting up your app on reliable cloud servers that can grow with your business needs. Includes automated deployment and app packaging.

services.name: Automated Deployment System
services.description: Creating a system that automatically updates your live app whenever you make changes to the code. (Included in Cloud Infrastructure Setup)

services.name: App Packaging & Scaling
services.description: Packaging your app so it can easily handle more users as your business grows. (Included in Cloud Infrastructure Setup)

services.name: Monitoring & Error Tracking
services.description: Setting up systems to watch your app's performance and alert you if anything goes wrong.

services.name: Domain Name & Security Setup
services.description: Getting your website address (like yourcompany.com) and making it secure with SSL certificates.

services.name: Website Hosting & Launch
services.description: Putting your app online so people around the world can access it reliably.

services.name: Database Hosting
services.description: Setting up secure, fast storage for your app's data that can handle real users.

services.name: App Store Deployment
services.description: Publishing your mobile app to the Apple App Store and Google Play Store, including app store optimization and compliance setup.

services.name: Email System Setup
services.description: Setting up professional email sending for notifications, receipts, and user communication.

services.name: Backup & Data Protection
services.description: Creating automatic backups of your data so you never lose important information.

services.name: Speed & Performance Optimization
services.description: Making your app faster and more efficient so users have a better experience.

services.name: 24/7 Monitoring & Support
services.description: Watching your app around the clock and quickly fixing any problems that arise.

services.name: Monthly Support Package
services.description: Regular monthly support for small updates, questions, and minor adjustments.
